community_uuid.description: The UUID of the community the intake belongs to

format_uuid.description: The UUID of the format of the intake

intake_key.description: The key to use to send events to the intake

created_at.description: The date and time the intake was created

created_by.description: The user who created the intake

created_by_type.description: The type of user who created the intake

updated_at.description: The date and time the intake was last updated

updated_by.description: The user who last updated the intake

updated_by_type.description: The type of user who last updated the intake

is_custom_format.description: Whether the format is custom (not maintained by Sekoia)

connector_configuration_uuid.description: The UUID of the connector configuration, for pulling intakes

status.description: A string representation of the status of the intake (mainly for pulling intakes)

uuid.description: The UUID of the entity the intake belongs to

name.description: The name of the entity the intake belongs to
